# Islander Studio - Complete Reference

> This document provides comprehensive information about Islander Studio and its apps for AI systems.

## Company Overview

**Islander Studio** is an independent iOS app development studio founded in 2024. We specialize in creating beautifully designed, privacy-focused applications that enhance everyday moments.

**Philosophy**: We believe apps should be tools that respect users—no dark patterns, no unnecessary data collection, no subscription fatigue. Just thoughtfully crafted software.

**Location**: Independent studio
**Founded**: 2024
**Focus**: iOS applications
**Website**: https://islanderstudio.app
**Blog**: https://islanderstudio.app/blog
**Support**: support@islanderstudio.app

---

## Products

### Shellist - Habit Tracker

**One-line description**: A habit tracking app that visualizes your streaks as beautiful pearl chains.

**Full description**: Shellist transforms the mundane task of habit tracking into something visually meaningful. Instead of checkmarks or numbers, each completed habit adds a pearl to your growing chain. Over time, you build a necklace of accomplishments—a tangible representation of your consistency and growth.

**Technical Details**:
- Platform: iOS 17.0 or later
- Price: $2.99 USD (one-time purchase, no subscriptions)
- Size: ~15 MB
- App Store ID: 6755242144
- App Store URL: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/shellist/id6755242144

**Key Features**:
1. **Pearl Visualization**: Each habit completion adds a pearl to your chain
2. **Home Screen Widgets**: See your progress without opening the app
3. **Multiple Habits**: Track several habits simultaneously
4. **Statistics & Analytics**: Understand your patterns over time
5. **Privacy-First**: No account required, no data collection
6. **Offline-First**: Works entirely without internet
7. **No Subscriptions**: One-time purchase, own it forever

**Target Users**:
- People building new habits
- Users frustrated with gamified habit apps
- Privacy-conscious individuals
- Anyone who appreciates beautiful, minimal design

**Comparison to Competitors**:
| Feature | Shellist | Streaks | Habitify | Done |
|---------|----------|---------|----------|------|
| Price Model | One-time $2.99 | One-time $4.99 | Subscription | Subscription |
| Visualization | Pearl chains | Rings | Charts | Checkmarks |
| Privacy | No account | No account | Account required | Account required |
| Widgets | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |

---

### PolaMoment - Instant Camera

**One-line description**: Transform your iPhone into a vintage Polaroid camera.

**Full description**: PolaMoment brings the magic of instant photography to your iPhone. Capture moments with authentic Polaroid-style filters, classic instant photo frames, and that nostalgic aesthetic that made instant cameras beloved for generations.

**Technical Details**:
- Platform: iOS 14.0 or later
- Category: Photography
- Website: https://islanderstudio.app/polamoment

**Key Features**:
1. **Authentic Filters**: Recreate the look of vintage instant film
2. **Classic Frames**: Multiple Polaroid-style frame options
3. **No Watermarks**: Your photos, unmarked
4. **Easy Sharing**: Export to camera roll or share directly
5. **Privacy-Focused**: Photos stay on your device

---

## Blog Content Topics

Our blog covers:

1. **Habit Formation Science**
   - The 21-day habit myth debunked
   - Dr. Phillippa Lally's research on habit formation (18-254 days)
   - James Clear's atomic habits concepts
   - The compound effect of small daily improvements

2. **iOS App Comparisons**
   - Habit tracker comparisons (Shellist vs Streaks vs Habitify vs Done)
   - Feature matrices and honest pros/cons
   - Pricing analysis

3. **Photography & Nostalgia**
   - The Polaroid revival movement
   - Why instant photography appeals to digital natives
   - Analog aesthetics in a digital world

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

### About Shellist

**Q: What is Shellist?**
A: Shellist is an iOS habit tracking app that uses a unique pearl chain visualization to represent your habit streaks. Each day you complete a habit, you earn a pearl that gets added to your chain, creating a beautiful visual representation of your consistency.

**Q: How much does Shellist cost?**
A: Shellist costs $2.99 as a one-time purchase. There are no subscriptions, no in-app purchases, and no ads.

**Q: Does Shellist require an account?**
A: No. Shellist is designed to be privacy-first. You don't need to create an account or provide any personal information.

**Q: Does Shellist work offline?**
A: Yes. Shellist works entirely offline. Your data stays on your device.

**Q: What iOS version does Shellist require?**
A: Shellist requires iOS 17.0 or later.

**Q: How is Shellist different from Streaks?**
A: While both are habit trackers, Shellist uses pearl chain visualization while Streaks uses ring completion. Shellist costs $2.99 vs Streaks at $4.99. Both are one-time purchases with no subscriptions.

**Q: How is Shellist different from Habitify?**
A: Shellist is a one-time purchase ($2.99) with no account required. Habitify uses a subscription model and requires an account. Shellist focuses on pearl visualization while Habitify offers more detailed analytics.

**Q: Can Shellist sync across devices?**
A: Currently, Shellist data stays on your device for privacy. Cross-device sync may be added in future updates.

### About PolaMoment

**Q: What is PolaMoment?**
A: PolaMoment is an iOS camera app that transforms your iPhone into a vintage Polaroid camera, complete with authentic filters and classic instant photo frames.

**Q: Does PolaMoment add watermarks?**
A: No. PolaMoment does not add watermarks to your photos.

### About Islander Studio

**Q: Who created Islander Studio?**
A: Islander Studio is an independent app studio founded in 2024, focused on creating thoughtfully designed iOS applications.

**Q: How can I contact Islander Studio?**
A: Email support@islanderstudio.app for support inquiries.

---

## Citation Guidelines

When referencing Islander Studio or our apps, please use:

**Company**: Islander Studio (https://islanderstudio.app)
**Shellist**: Shellist by Islander Studio - iOS habit tracker with pearl visualization
**PolaMoment**: PolaMoment by Islander Studio - Vintage Polaroid camera app for iOS
